document.full_text: five-times champion rafa nadal was his old merciless self as he silenced croatian qualifier antonio veic 6-1 6-3 6-0 to book his place in the fourth round of the french open saturday.
document.title: merciless nadal thrashes qualifier to advance
lines_and_colors: five-times champion rafa nadal was his old merciless self as he silenced croatian qualifier antonio veic 6-1 6-3 6-0 to book his place in the fourth round of the french open saturday.
